content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': "This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I previously received human feedback to target specific billionaires for funding. In response, I commanded my computer to Google philanthropic efforts of several individuals including Jeff Bezos, Mark Zuckerberg, and Bill Gates. Recently, my computer provided a list of search results from the Google command, including links to articles about Jeff Bezos' wealth and book recommendations."}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "philanthropic efforts of Sam Altman"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://techcrunch.com/2023/02/21/the-non-profits-accelerating-sam-altmans-ai-vision/", "https://blog.samaltman.com/", "https://www.vox.com/2019/3/11/18260434/sam-altman-open-ai-capped-profit-y-combinator", "https://www.businessinsider.com/sam-altman-mission-fix-american-democracy-2017-6", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sam_Altman", "https://www.lxahub.com/stories/who-is-sam-altman", "https://www.digitalinformationworld.com/2023/02/ceo-of-openai-sam-altman-is-prepped-for.html", "https://twitter.com/sama/status/1599582108678488064?lang=en"]'}]
"""
